sentences.en: Credit is the intercommunity norm which enterprise should observe during building a network, it is the basis to accomplish enterprise cooperation.
sentences.cn: 信任是建立网络中企业应遵守的共同性规范，实现企业合作的基础；

sentences.en: In this study, we examine how intercommunity relationships affect the growth of organizational communities.
sentences.cn: 在本文中，我们研究了共同性关系是如何影响组织社区的成长的。

sentences.en: Modern meanings of the Russian thought are as following: intercommunity, the world reply, the peaceful coexistence of different nations and active doomsday in the face of catastrophe.
sentences.cn: 对共同性的尊崇和信奉，全世界回应能力、不同文化的民族能够和平共处、面对灾难的积极的末日论，是俄罗斯思想中具有现代意义的主要因素。
